item.title: 01 - Genesis
item.description: LIST WHERE contains(Aliases, "Genesis") SORT number(replace(file.name, "Gen ", "")) ASC.

item.title: Gen 1
item.description: Genesis 1 Â§ 1 Â§ In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth. 2 Â§ The earth was without form and void, and darkness was over the face of the deep.

item.title: Gen 10
item.description: Genesis 10 Â§ 1 Â§ These are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth. Sons were born to them after the flood. 2 Â§ The sons of Japheth: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech, and Tiras.

item.title: Gen 11
item.description: Genesis 11 Â§ 1 Â§ Now the whole earth had one language and the same words. 2 Â§ And as people migrated from the east, they found a plain in the land of Shinar and settled there.

item.title: Gen 12
item.description: Genesis 12 Â§ 1 Â§ Now the LORD said to Abram, â€œGo from your country and your kindred and your fatherâ€™s house to the land that I will show you. 2 Â§ And I will make of you a great nation, and I will bless you and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing.

item.title: Gen 13
item.description: Genesis 13 Â§ 1 Â§ So Abram went up from Egypt, he and his wife and all that he had, and Lot with him, into the Negeb. 2 Â§ Now Abram was very rich in livestock, in silver, and in gold.

item.title: Gen 14
item.description: Genesis 14 Â§ 1 Â§ In the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of Goiim, 2 Â§ these kings made war with Bera king of Sodom, Birsha king of Gomorrah, Shinab king of Admah, Shemeber king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela (that is, Zoar).

item.title: Gen 15
item.description: Genesis 15 Â§ 1 Â§ After these things the word of the LORD came to Abram in a vision: â€œFear not, Abram, I am your shield; your reward shall be very great.

item.title: Gen 16
item.description: Genesis 16 Â§ 1 Â§ Now Sarai, Abramâ€™s wife, had borne him no children. She had a female Egyptian servant whose name was Hagar. 2 Â§ And Sarai said to Abram, â€œBehold now, the LORD has prevented me from bearing children.

item.title: Gen 17
item.description: Genesis 17 Â§ 1 Â§ When Abram was ninety-nine years old the LORD appeared to Abram and said to him, â€œI am God Almighty; walk before me, and be blameless, 2 Â§ that I may make my covenant between me and you, and may multiply you greatly.
